price: ಪ್ರತಿಫಲದ ದಿನದ ತನಕ ನಿನ್ನ ಮೇಲೆ ಶಾಪವಿದೆ.”
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Kannada translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kannada language, translated by Muhammad Hamza Battur.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
